languages.text: {n}Глаза мужчины скрывает плотная повязка, но он безошибочно поворачивает лицо к вам. Голос его резок и скрипуч, словно карканье птицы.{/n} "Да не оскудеет заряд милости {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} в руках преданных".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глазницы мужчины пусты и темны, но он безошибочно поворачивает лицо к вам. Голос его резок и скрипуч, словно карканье птицы.{/n} "Да не оскудеет заряд милости {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} в руках преданных".

languages.text: {n}A tight bandage covers the man's eyes, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing:{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза мужчины скрывает плотная повязка, но он безошибочно поворачивает лицо к вам. Голос его резок и скрипуч, словно карканье птицы.{/n} "Да не оскудеет заряд милости {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} в руках преданных".

traits.locale_text: {n}A tight bandage covers the man's eyes, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing:{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."

{n}The man's eye sockets are dark and empty, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing.{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."

{n}A tight bandage covers the man's eyes, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing:{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."

languages.text: {n}Eine enge Bandage bedeckt die Augen des Mannes, aber er wendet dir ohne zu zögern sein Gesicht zu. Seine scharfe, kreischende Stimme gleicht dem Krächzen eines Vogels.{/n} "Möge die Kraft der Gnade des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} in den Händen der Gläubigen Bestand haben."
languages.original_text: {n}A tight bandage covers the man's eyes, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing:{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine enge Bandage bedeckt die Augen des Mannes, aber er wendet dir ohne zu zögern sein Gesicht zu. Seine scharfe, kreischende Stimme gleicht dem Krächzen eines Vogels.{/n} "Möge die Kraft der Gnade des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} in den Händen der Gläubigen Bestand haben."

languages.text: {n}Si un bandage serré masque les yeux de l'homme, il tourne le visage dans votre direction sans la moindre hésitation. Sa voix aiguë et stridente fait penser à celle d'un oiseau.{/n} « Que le courant de miséricorde de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} reste à jamais entre les mains des fidèles. »
languages.original_text: {n}A tight bandage covers the man's eyes, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing:{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Si un bandage serré masque les yeux de l'homme, il tourne le visage dans votre direction sans la moindre hésitation. Sa voix aiguë et stridente fait penser à celle d'un oiseau.{/n} « Que le courant de miséricorde de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} reste à jamais entre les mains des fidèles. »

languages.text: {n}尽管这个人的双眼上紧紧缠着绷带，但他却毫不犹豫地转向了你。他的声音尖锐而刺耳，仿佛鸟叫一般。{/n}“愿{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的怜悯长存于虔信之人手中。”
languages.original_text: {n}A tight bandage covers the man's eyes, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing:{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管这个人的双眼上紧紧缠着绷带，但他却毫不犹豫地转向了你。他的声音尖锐而刺耳，仿佛鸟叫一般。{/n}“愿{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的怜悯长存于虔信之人手中。”

languages.text: {n}男の眼窩は暗く虚ろだったが、その顔は、ためらいなくあなたに向けられている。その声は鋭く、鳥の鳴き声とは程遠い金切り声のようなものだった。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の慈悲が、忠実なる者の手に宿らんことを」
languages.original_text: {n}A tight bandage covers the man's eyes, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing:{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}男の眼窩は暗く虚ろだったが、その顔は、ためらいなくあなたに向けられている。その声は鋭く、鳥の鳴き声とは程遠い金切り声のようなものだった。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の慈悲が、忠実なる者の手に宿らんことを」

languages.text: {n}Una venda ajustada tapa los ojos del hombre, pero eso no le impide girar la cara hacia ti sin vacilar. Tiene una voz aguda y chillona, parecida al graznido de un pájaro.{/n} «Que la carga de la misericordia del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} perdure en las manos de los fieles».
languages.original_text: {n}A tight bandage covers the man's eyes, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing:{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una venda ajustada tapa los ojos del hombre, pero eso no le impide girar la cara hacia ti sin vacilar. Tiene una voz aguda y chillona, parecida al graznido de un pájaro.{/n} «Que la carga de la misericordia del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} perdure en las manos de los fieles».

languages.text: {n}Sıkı bir sargı, adamın gözlerini kapatıyor. Buna rağmen tereddüt etmeden yüzünü sana dönüyor. Kuş gaklamasına benzeyen keskin, cırtlak bir sesi var.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} merhametiyle bezeli o mukaddes yük, inançlıların ellerinde ebediyen hüküm sürsün."
languages.original_text: {n}A tight bandage covers the man's eyes, yet he turns his face straight toward you with no hesitation. He has a sharp, screeching voice not unlike a bird's cawing:{/n} "May the charge of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s mercy persist in the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sıkı bir sargı, adamın gözlerini kapatıyor. Buna rağmen tereddüt etmeden yüzünü sana dönüyor. Kuş gaklamasına benzeyen keskin, cırtlak bir sesi var.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} merhametiyle bezeli o mukaddes yük, inançlıların ellerinde ebediyen hüküm sürsün."
